newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Moody's rates TGS commercial paper Prime-1.
newsitem.headline: Moody's rates TGS commercial paper Prime-1.

text.p: Moody's Investors Services said Wednesday it assigned a Prime-1 rating to the $150 million letter of credit-backed commercial paper programs of Argentina's Transportadora de Gas del Sur SA.
The rating applies to tranches A and B of the programs.
Moody's said in a statement the rating is based on the Prime-1 rating of Dresdner Bank AG's New York branch.
"The bank has issued an irrevocable direct-pay letter of credit, which provides full support for the payment of commercial paper notes," said Moody's.
